Package org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple

package org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple
Provides tuple classes, both mutable and immutable Pair and Triple.
Since:
3.0
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.apache.commons.lang3
    Provides highly reusable utility methods, chiefly concerned with adding value to the java.lang classes.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ImmutablePair<L,R>
    An immutable pair consisting of two Object elements.
    ImmutableTriple<L,M,R>
    An immutable triple consisting of three Object elements.
    MutablePair<L,R>
    A mutable pair consisting of two Object elements.
    MutableTriple<L,M,R>
    A mutable triple consisting of three Object elements.
    Pair<L,R>
    A pair consisting of two elements.
    Triple<L,M,R>
    A triple consisting of three elements.
